title: [HOLD for payment 2024-10-24] [$250] Quick action - QAB is blank after submitting expense to invalid user and dismissing error
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com
2. Go to FAB > Submit expense.
3. Enter amount > Next.
4. Select a VOIP number (+1 631-791-8378).
5. Submit the expense.
6. Dismiss the error in the report.
7. Open FAB.

Expected result: Quick action button will not be blank.

Actual result: None
